title: Case Files of the Genius Asshole - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Mystery   Romance   School Life   Seinen
tags: College/University   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist
author: TSUBAKO   つばこ
description: The devil in a white lab coat – Amano Yuuji is a handsome guy and a genius. But his personality is the shittiest, even going so far as to call himself “The Genius Asshole.” He is by no means a righteous protagonist, but don’t miss out on the teachings, garbage, and others. It’s a little pretentious but kind (?) story.>
